title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-4.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-4.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Subpart: (a) New York State tribe means those members
of the six Iroquoian tribes, the Shinnecock tribe, and the Poospatuck tribe, who reside in the State of New York. (b) Official tribal roll means the list of
individuals designated by the tribal authorities as members of a New York State
tribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
